title2:
Establish a new educational paradigm
regardless of time and place through
non-face-to-face online lectures
using the metaverse
content1: <color>By preparing an immersive 3D online education system</color> that is more effective than existing 2D online education, we introduce a future education system and increase the future capabilities of current students. By creating an innovative educational environment, it aims to increase the efficiency of university education and to inspire professors' competence and mission.
content2: Provides a platform for access to PC web, Mobile web, and Oculus Quest2. In addition, it implements at least 10 metaverse VR classroom templates, and provides a variety of templates such as regular classrooms, group classrooms, terraced classrooms, grand classrooms, and consumption spaces. <color>All classrooms were implemented the same as actual classrooms</color> using Metaport.
content3: <color>Metaverse lecture management features</color> include real-time screen sharing of lecturers, external video playback, user mute, inappropriate personnel forced exits, real-time translation, whiteboard signatures, 3D object uploads and manipulations, attendance verification and information storage, portal movement/creation, questions, and presentations.
content4: With the <color>VR metaverse function</color>, all functions can be implemented and operated using VR HMD, and hand tracking and operation of VR-connected avatars can be implemented.
content5: <color>180 degree 3D video playback is possible</color> on VR HMD. It also provides a manual for using the metaverse lecture system, and detailed explanations such as metaverse lecture functions, how to use the construction space, and teacher lecture management functions are provided through manuals to enhance user convenience.
